reviews.text: Nice station. Why are toilets always closed?
Staff are very friendly and helpful I got lots of information and it's clean and tidy 👍🚂🚇

Step free access is available on both sides as well as having two car parks located close together and a ticket office located on the Birmingham side. Trains here are decently frequent though formed of 3 to 4 coaches most of the time.

Due to Living in Coseley, obviously opinions are strong. But what I love about this train station is that it can easily take me to Wolverhampton on Platform 2, which is only one stop away (not even 5 minutes on the train) or the likes of Tipton, Smethwich, Birmingham, Aston and Walsall on the other platform 1. It would genuinely be hard to move about from Coseley to "said" cities without this train station. It's very essential to Coseley.
If you can unravel the mystery of what time to get there for trains, this little station is really well-connected and convenient. Forget about parking here though as there are only about 30 spaces.
